articles.author: Lim Yian Lu
articles.title: Mirror’s Anson Lo wins Best New Asian Artist (Mandarin) at Mnet Asian Music Awards 2021 - Yahoo News
articles.description: He's the first artist from Hong Kong to win this award.
articles.content:
Anson Lo. (Photo: Instagram/ansonlht)
Anson Lo of Cantopop boy band Mirror won the Best New Asian Artist (Mandarin) at the 2021 Mnet Asian Music Awards held on Saturday (11 December). He is also the… [+1308 chars]

articles.title: Car bursts into flames in Hougang, sends 3 teens fleeing - AsiaOne
articles.description: Three teens made a quick escape after the car they were in burst into flames in Hougang last Saturday (Dec 11) afternoon. The sedan caught fire while it was parked near the unloading area of an HDB block along Hougang Street 92. A resident told Shin Min Daily…

articles.title: Malaysian artists earn freedom to be creative with NFTs - Al Jazeera English

articles.title: French cheese product imported by Cold Storage recalled due to 'possible' presence of bacteria - channelnewsasia.com
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: A cheese product imported from France has been recalled due to the "possible presence" of listeria monocytogenes, a bacteria that can cause foodborne illness. 

The recall for Cantorel’s Plateau 5 Fromages was first issued by a European Commissio…
